title: Dokument inifrån: Skamlös
overview: Company manager Richard Olsson is accused of deceiving his clients and playing with people's lives. He sees himself as a tough negotiator, who does everything to ensure that his clients win. After staying hidden from the public for a long time, he invites SVT to a castle. He wants to tell about the law firm that made him rich. What he doesn't know is that the journalists will soon be able to listen to his phone calls. In the secret recordings, the image of a shameless power abuser who manipulates both clients and employees emerges.
